sqoop.arg: SELECT _SP_PalletLabelID,PalletID,MachineStage,PartNumber,InvState,PalletNo,CreatedDT,CompleteDT,Quantity,LabelTemplate,PrinterURL,PrintedDT,ScannedDT,IsCancelled,IsReprint,PartDescription,LabelSaveDirectory,IsPrintLandscape,NoCopies,LabelsPerInventoryPack, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_PalletLabel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionDeviceID,AcquisitionVariableTypeID,WorkstationConfigID,Instructions,ImageURI,RfSourceID,DataDeviceID,DeviceArgs,DeviceOutput,FillMode,Preset,Multiplier,PreprocessingFunction,IsManualTrigger,IsManualConfirm, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionDevice WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionNoteID,ActionID,Note,Comments,NoteDT,LoginID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionNote WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AssetID,AssetName,RfAssetTypeID,LineID,MachineStageID,ToolID,GaugeID,PartID,InventoryPackID,LocationID,IsRetired,CostCentreID,ManufacturerID,SupplierID,AcquiredDT,PONumber,OrderedDT,ExpectedDeliveryDT,ExpectedFirstUseDT,EndUseDT,EndUseReason,PurchaseCost,DefaultLocationID,Comments, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Asset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AttributeTypeID,ProductTypeID,Name,Description,ImageURI,RfAttributeClassID,IsPassFail,IsRaiseCA,LikelyCauses,Impact,Weighting,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,AttributeTypeCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT BOMVariantID,BOMVariant,PartID,IsDefault,BOMVariantIndex,IsRetired,LoginID,DT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernStatusID,ConcernStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ConcernStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DefectCountID,MeasurementSetID,HeadNo,DefectCount,Ignored,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DefectCount WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT EBATriggerID,RfTriggerTypeID,ContextDictionary,TriggerOwnerID,CreateDT,ProcessedDT,RfWatchProcessStateID,Message,TotalTime,OracleInsertTime,OracleConnectionTime,OracleInsertStatement, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.EBATrigger WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT IndividualDefectID,PartInstanceID,Ignored,DefectCount,MeasurementSetID,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.IndividualDefect WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT InvStateID,InvState,Description,RfInvStateID,InvStateCode,IsAddToProduction,IsAddToHFI,IsDefault, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InvState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineTypeID,LineType,Description,IsRetired,LineInfoPrecedence,BudgetChangeOver,BudgetEfficiency, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernID,DocumentID,LKConcernDocumentID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernDocument WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentInvPackID,DocumentID,InventoryPackID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentInvPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkLineLineGroupID,LineGroupID,LineID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLineLineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkMPGMPID,MaintenanceProcedureGroupID,MaintenanceProcedureID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMPGMP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartID,LineSectionID,LkPartLineSectionID,TheoreticalCycleTime, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartLineSection WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RfSPCStatID,SPCStatsStyleID,LkSPCStatsStyleRfSPCStatID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKSPCStatsStyleRfSPCStat_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VarChartOCID,RfViolationRuleID,LkVCOCVRuleID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkVCOCVRule WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageEventID,LoginID,DT,MachineStageID,MachineStageEventTypeID,Comments, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageEvent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopReasonGroupID,MachineStopReasonGroup,Description,MachineStopReasonGroupCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopReasonGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceProcedureGroupID,MaintenanceProcedureGroup,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,WorkDone,Comments,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWork_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetRequiredID,EBATriggerID,AcquisitionContextID,MeasurementSetID,RfAcquisitionStatusID,SubmittedDT,DueDT,DeadlineDT,ExpiryDT,OwnerID,ActionID,JobID,PartID,AssignedLoginID,InventoryPackID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSetRequired WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCDigitalID,OPCItemID,Description,Formula,VariableTypeID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCDigital WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCParameterID,OPCItemID,Description,Scale,Offset,Formula,VariableTypeID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCParameter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartClassificationID,PartClassification,RfPartClassificationID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartClassification WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ProductionStopID,ProductionStopReasonID,JobID,FromDT,ToDT,LineID,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStop WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapID,ScrapReasonID,PartID,Quantity,UnitID,DT,MachineStageID,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Scrap WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantTimeWindowsID,JobHistory,ProductionSpoilageHistory,DowntimeHistory,InventoryHistory,InventoryLabelHistory,BuildRecordHistory,LineInfoHistory,QualityMeasurementHistory,ProcessParameterHistory,OPCItemHistoryHistory,InitialLineInfoHistory,MaintenanceProjectionPeriod,ShiftLookAheadDays,ForwardSchedulingWindow,DefaultMaxTrendRecallWindow,DefaultConcernDuePeriod, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantTimeWindows WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCCalcStyleID,SPCCalcStyle,CmThreshold,CpThreshold,PpThreshold,CgThreshold,RnRThreshold,IsShowCpOnlyIfStable,CAMTarget,CpBasedOnID,CLBasedOnID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCCalcStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetViewStyleID,SPCChartSetViewStyle,IsSpecLimits,IsControlLimitZones,IsGrid,IsTimescaled,IsHAxis,IsVAxis,IsXChart,IsRsChart,IsRsWChart,IsDistribution,IsShowComments,IsXScatter,IsIncludeIgnored,IsOnlyOSOCCharts,SPCStatsStyleID,IsVerticalOverview,OverviewWidth,OverviewHeight,PageBreakRfCutByIDs,ChartWidth,ChartHeight,IsFixedScale,IsParetoCurve,IsLegend,IsHorizontalDistribution,IsSigmaLines,IsShowCAComments,IsShowUnAckAlarms,HorizontalOffset,IsShowLimitLabels,IsColourZones,IsSystem,IsOSHotCold,FixedScaleOverscaling,IsConstantTitleRow,IsShowStatCategories,IsOverlayEnvelope,IsGradientBackground,RunChartFont,DistributionFont,StatisticsFont,VAxisFont,HAxisFont,OverlayKeyFont,IsShowOverlayKey, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSetViewStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SupplierID,Supplier,SupplierCode,AddressID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Supplier WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagMSID,MeasurementSetID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT,TagTreeNodeID,X,Y, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTypeID,RfDataTypeID,Name,TagTypeCode,ISSYSTEM,TAGVIEW, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolID,Supplier,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,Ident, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolGroupID,ToolGroup,Description,ToolGroupCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT FromUnitID,ToUnitID,Multiplier,UnitConversionID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitConversion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableID,VariableTypeID,ProductID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Variable WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WOID,WONumber,RunNo,PartID,QuantityOrdered,RfJobStatusID,DeadlineDT,ActualStartDT,ActualEndDT,PlannedStartDT,PlannedEndDT,EstimatedStartDT,EstimatedEndDT,CustomerID,IsDiscrete,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,WORefID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WorkInstructionStepID,WorkInstructionStep,WorkInstructionProcedureID,OperationTypeID,StepOrder,RfSpecialActionTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStop.MachineStopID, MachineStop.MachineStopReasonID, MachineStop.FromDT, MachineStop.ToDT, MachineStop.MachineStageID, MachineStop.IsEdited, MachineStop.RevisionNo, MachineStop_.StopComments, MachineStop_.StartComments, MachineStop_.StartLoginID, MachineStop_.StopLoginID, MachineStop_.OpenedStopDT, MachineStop_.SavedStopDT, MachineStop_.OpenedStartDT, MachineStop_.SavedStartDT, MachineStop_.OriginalLoginID, MachineStop_.EditedMachineStopID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM MachineStop FULL JOIN MachineStop_ ON (MachineStop.MachineStopID = MachineStop_.MachineStopID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
